title: Give access to Premiums on WorkShifts to a Manager
content: An Administrator can give the possibility to a Manager to assign a premium on work shifts to an employee when creating a shift.Warning: Only Administrators can configure since this is monetary information.In the main menu Employees, enter the name of the manager concerned,Click on Mobile and Web Access, then on Preferences,Check the Use Premiums on WorkShifts box,Click on Save.The Manager can now add a premium to a shift. When creating the schedule: Add this premium to a timesheet:Helpful?00Updated: 2 years ago Share :
